column1: Baby Barnaby's////Oh sweet baby Jeezzuss. I love Baby Barnaby's. I've been there a couple of times now
column2: and I love their food. Though there might be a wait
column3: I believe that it is worth the wait. The place is small to begin with and there really isn't much of a parking lot
column4: so you need to park on the streets next by it. They are dog friendly; both times I went
column5: I saw that people brought their dogs along with them. Also
column6: the owner (or so I believe is the owner) even provides water for them. :) Though there really isn't an official wait staff coming by to check up on you
column7: it didn't bother me much. Just flag them down
column8: and they'll help you out to the best of their ability.
